title: Inside The New York Times Book Review: Susan Faludi’s ‘In the Darkroom’
description: This week, Susan Faludi discusses her new memoir, “In the Darkroom”; Alexandra Alter has news from the publishing world; James Lee McDonough talks about his new biography of William Tecumseh Sherman; listeners share some of their favorite summer reading memories; and Gregory Cowles and Parul Sehgal on what people are reading. Pamela Paul is the host.
author: books@nytimes.com (The New York Times)

Pamela Paul is the host.
